ingredients: 8 teaspoons brown sugar, 2 tablespoons butter, cut into 8 pieces, 1 pinch ground cinnamon, or more to taste, 4  ripe peaches, halved and pitted , 4 scoops vanilla ice cream
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 10%, Saturated Fat 5g 26%, Cholesterol 25mg 8%, Sodium 63mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 17g 6%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 42mg 210%, Calcium 48mg 4%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 85mg 2%
